abstract: Hoping to encourage bankers and managers to stay, Citigroup has begun dispensing several million stock options to more than a quarter of its workers in a way that could result in a sizable gain for them.
snippet: Hoping to encourage bankers and managers to stay, Citigroup has begun dispensing several million stock options to more than a quarter of its workers in a way that could result in a sizable gain for them.
lead_paragraph: Hoping to encourage bankers and managers to stay, Citigroup has begun dispensing several million stock options to more than a quarter of its workers in a way that could result in a sizable gain for them, The New York Times’s Eric Dash reports.

headline.main: To Retain Its Bankers, Citi Offers Option Plan
